name: The Scribe
description:
• WASD to move
  • SPACE to interact with things in the scene
  • SPACE or use MOUSE to click on the LOWER RIGHT button to continue a conversation
  • ESC to reach the Settings while in the game
  • This game is not meant to be played in Full Screen. The resolution is intentional.
  • For best results, download the .exe file.
  • Cristian Lavado - Music Composer
  • For the full list of additional credits, see the downloadable text file
  • KNOWN BUGS: 
    • The Save/Load feature does not work all the time.
  • FUTURE ADDITIONS:
    • Music tracks will be normalized in terms of default volume so volume is standard for all tracks
    • Final music tracks will be added
